newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 11.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 11.

text.p: The following stories were reported in Friday's Daily Variety:
NEW YORK - Time Warner Inc completed its $7 billion acquisition of Turner Broadcasting System Inc more than a year after it was first announced.

HOLLYWOOD - Universal Pictures of Seagram Co Ltd has entered into a five-year deal with Beacon Communications. The agreement also aligns MCA with the Denver-based Ascent Entertainment Group, Beacon's parent company, which has interests in sports teams and interactive television.
